name: Frankie's House
description:
W-A-D keys or arrow keys to move and jump.

This project is my first effort at game development and was designed, programmed, and "scored" (with love) during the early days of quarantine in Queens, NYC with my cat (the real Frankie) and girlfriend. 

Any money donated to this project through Itch.io will be passed along to support NYC Health + Hospitals (https://nychhc.networkforgood.com/). Please donate a few bucks, either here or directly to NYCHHC, if you are in a position to do so.
